name: Master Degree Project - GTU, Otar Murmanishvili
description: This project was made by Otar Murmanishvili. The mentioned project works in the event of an accident of a linearly moving car when the car hits a pedestrian crossing the road. Based on the input data, the code will process it, perform calculations and draw a conclusion whether the driver had a physical-technical means or whether the driver had enough distance to the pedestrian to avoid the accident.
